note:
Recently retired #numbercruncher in the USA. I like #science. And counting. And #progressives. My hobbies include drinking coffee, listening to cozy historical fiction mysteries, and sometimes knitting. But Iâ€™m not that good at knitting.

My only remaining goals in life are to tell people that: in the US, a learning book called a primer is pronounced PRIMMER. And if it is between March and October, chances are good you are on daylight time not standard time. EDT, CDT, MDT, PDT. Thank you.
